title: Dietary Scanner
description: Web application that allows users to enter a bar code of food item and get facts such as whether it is halal or not, vegan, vegetarian, and any allergens

title: Target Showdown
description: Engaging game where players must click on dynamically resizing targets, with built in trackers to measure players' precision, speed, and lives

title: ServeCampus
description: Website that allows professors/staff members to advertise research/volunteer positions
